subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams won the French Open by topping the defending champion Maria Sharapova. At 31, she has won 16 Grand Slam singles events, and appears nowhere near finished.
snippet: Serena Williams won the French Open by topping the defending champion Maria Sharapova. At 31, she has won 16 Grand Slam singles events, and appears nowhere near finished.
